name: Temple of Elemental Evil, The
description: This Installer downloads and installs Circle of Eight ModPack 8.1.0 standard version
notes: A bugfix, rules compliance, and expanded content modification for Troika Games' 'The Temple of Elemental Evil.'
content:
files:
- patch: https://www.moddb.com/downloads/mirror/73404/121/1266952bee13aec28553e05ea890a55e/?referer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.moddb.com%2Fmods%2Fcircle-of-eight-modpack%2Fdownloads
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- move:
    description: Moving the Temple+
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Circle_of_Eight_Modpack_8.1.0_Standard_Edition_Setup.exe
    src: patch
- task:
    description: Running the Temple+
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Circle_of_Eight_Modpack_8.1.0_Standard_Edition_Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: temple-of-elemental-evil-the
